events.message: I recently purchased a headset from your store, but it does not work properly and I want to request a refund. The sound cuts in and out frequently.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to product malfunction reported by the customer.
The case has been assigned to Agent Emily for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the trouble with your headset. I’ll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if you have the original packaging and receipt available for the return?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 998877, and I still have the packaging and receipt intact.
Great! I have initiated your refund request. Please send the headset back using the prepaid shipping label I will email you shortly.
Thanks for making this process easy. I appreciate the prepaid label, it will save me a lot of hassle.
We have received your returned headset and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
